d.f: `我~`國~`歷史~`上~`合稱~`東嶽~`泰山~、`西嶽~`華山~、`南嶽~`衡山~、`北嶽~`恆山~`和~`中嶽~`嵩山~`等~`五~`大名~`山~`為~`五嶽~。

English: Five Sacred Mountains of the Daoists, namely: Mt Tai `泰山~[Tai4 Shan1] in Shandong, Mt Hua `華山~|华`山~[Hua4 Shan1] in Shaanxi, Mt Heng `衡山~[Heng2 Shan1] in Hunan, Mt Heng `恆山~|`恒~`山~[Heng2 Shan1] in Shanxi, Mt Song `嵩山~[Song1 Shan1] in Henan
